text: I would suggest using WSL2 in Julia and run it off linux, with the remote wsl extension for vs code :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: I would suggest using WSL2 in Julia and run it off linux, with the remote wsl extension for vs code

text: This is a sensible suggestion if you are using your personal computer and have complete access rights. Not so feasible when you have a company laptop where you don't have full control of it ... including the ability to install WSL2 :disappointed:
